briefTitle: Early Assessment of the Response to Neo-adjuvant Chemotherapy in Breast Cancer Patients With FDG-PET
officialTitle: Early Assessment of the Response to Neo-adjuvant Chemotherapy in Breast Cancer Patients With FDG-PET
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Variation rate of SUV(BSA max)before and after the 1st cycle of neoadjuvant chemotherapy
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Age \> 18
* Breast cancer treated by neo-adjuvant chemotherapy (T\>2cm)
* Measurable lesions ,assessed clinically and by ultrasound
* Delay minimum between biopsy and PET: 15 days
* PS-WHO: 0

Exclusion Criteria:

* T\<2cm
* Inflammatory breast cancer (T4d)
* Diabetic patients unbalanced (glycemia\>1.40)
* Pregnant or lactating women
